decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Statement prepared by EPS Group Ltd and dated 5 September 2023. Prior to first occupation, as-built' Standard Assessment Procedure (SAP) outputs must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the proposed dwelling has achieved the targeted reduction in CO2 emissions. All of the approved measures must thereafter be retained for as long as the development is in existence.Reason: To comply with Policy 31 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018

The development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the approved Drainage Strategy and Flood Risk Assessment (231720/DS/AG/KL/01) prepared by Lanmoor Consulting Ltd and dated 31 August 2023. Prior to first occupation of the development, written confirmation that the approved site drainage and flood risk management measures, including SuDS, have been implemented as part of the development as built must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. All of the approved measures must thereafter be retained and proposed SuDS maintenance measures undertaken for as long as the development is in existence.Reason: To comply with Policy 32 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018
description: Application to clear condition 6 (SAP) and 7 (Flood Risk) of approved application DM2023/00780.
